attributes.action: Preserve Dyce Railway's Signal Box Saving It From Being Demolished
attributes.background:
The article informed of plans to demolish the Dyce Railway Station's Control Tower which is something residents simply do not want to happen.

The Signal Box has always been an integral part of Dyce, enriched with local history.

The majority of residents are against plans to demolish it.
